body.raw:
# Getting Started with Codebuff

Welcome to Codebuff! This guide will help you get up and running quickly with our AI-powered coding assistant.

## Installation

Install Codebuff globally using npm:

<CodeDemo>
```bash
npm install -g codebuff
```
</CodeDemo>

## Basic Usage

Start using Codebuff in your project directory:

<CodeDemo>
```bash
codebuff
```
</CodeDemo>

That's it! Codebuff is now ready to help you with your coding tasks.

body.raw:
# Refactoring Patterns

Common refactoring patterns and how to implement them with Codebuff.

## Extract Method

Learn how to use Codebuff to identify and extract repeated code patterns:
- Detect duplicate code
- Suggest meaningful names
- Handle parameter passing

# Troubleshooting Guide

Common issues and their solutions when using Codebuff.

## Connection Issues

If you're having trouble connecting:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Verify your authentication token
3. Try restarting Codebuff

## Permission Errors

When encountering permission errors:
1. Check file permissions
2. Verify you're in the correct directory
3. Ensure you have write access

body.raw:
# TypeScript Conversion Success Story

Converting a large JavaScript codebase to TypeScript with Codebuff.

## Project Scope

- 100k+ lines of JavaScript
- Complex React components
- Legacy jQuery code
- Custom build system

## Implementation

Codebuff helped:
- Generate initial type definitions
- Identify type inconsistencies
- Refactor problematic patterns
- Maintain runtime behavior

body.raw:
# Code Review Best Practices

Learn how to use Codebuff to streamline your code review process.

## Automated Reviews

Codebuff can help automate parts of your code review:
- Style consistency checks
- Common bug detection
- Performance improvement suggestions

body.raw:
# Keyboard Shortcuts

Master these keyboard shortcuts to boost your productivity with Codebuff.

## Navigation

- `Ctrl/Cmd + U`: Undo last change
- `Ctrl/Cmd + R`: Redo change
- `Esc`: Cancel current operation
- `Up/Down`: Navigate through command history

## File Operations

- `Ctrl/Cmd + S`: Save current changes
- `Ctrl/Cmd + D`: View diff of changes

body.raw:
# Monorepo Migration Case Study

How a growing startup used Codebuff to consolidate their repositories.

## The Challenge

Managing 20+ repositories was becoming a maintenance burden.

## The Solution

Codebuff assisted with:
- Repository analysis
- Dependency management
- Build system updates
- Test suite consolidation

body.raw:
# API Migration Success

See how a team used Codebuff to migrate their REST API to GraphQL.

## Challenge

The team needed to migrate 50+ endpoints while maintaining backwards compatibility.

## Solution

Codebuff helped:
- Analyze existing endpoints
- Generate GraphQL schemas
- Create resolvers
- Maintain test coverage
